column3: Cases Pending Investigation from Previous Year (Col.3)
column7: Cases Transferred to other PS/ Magistrate (Col.7)
column8: Cases not Investigated U/S 157(1) (b) of Cr.PC (Col.8)
column9: Final Report - True but Insufficient Evidence (Col.9)
column13: Final Report - Total (Col.13) = (Col.9+ Col.10 + Col.11+ Col.12)
column14: Cases in which Chargesheets were Submitted (Col.14)
column15: Total Cases Disposed off by Police (Col.15) = (Col. 7+8+ Col.13+ Col.14)
column16: Cases Pending Investigation at the End of the Year (Col.16) = (Col. 5 - (Col.6 + Col.15))
